long_description: Swift, light and sleek, the Marin Cortina CX cyclocross bike uses an ultralight, very stiff carbon fiber frame and SRAM components to speed you through tough 'cross courses. Internal cable routing protects cables from collecting grime. Carbon fork further reduces weight and supplies sure steering. Durable and snappy SRAM Rival shifters and front derailleur offer excellent reliability throughout the 20-speed drivetrain. SRAM XO type 2 rear derailleur provides precise shifts and also increases chain tension with a clutch mechanism to reduce the possibility of a dropped chain and ruined race. TPR Spyre Dual Piston mechanical disc brakes supply powerful braking in all conditions. Tubeless-ready WTB Frequency i19 rims feature Continental Cyclocross Race tires for excellent traction on muddy courses. Specs of the Marin Cortina CX cyclocross bike are subject to change.
